item.title: Terminus
item.description: About Terminus is a terminal theme for Hugo. I built it for my own site, but you can use it for your site If you want to. I built this in my spare time to teach myself, so if anything is broken, don’t hesitate to tell me or fix it and give me a pull request. Install Enter your themes directory Run this command git clone https://github.com/readabilityLOL/terminus.git themes/terminus
